channel.title: CVE Feed for Yamaha Corporation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Yamaha Corporation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-20843|2024-08-03T17:53:22.719Z -- yamaha%20corporation -- rtx830%2C%20nvr510%2C%20nvr700w%2C%20rtx1210
item.description: Cross-site script inclusion vulnerability in the Web GUI of RTX830 Rev.15.02.17 and earlier, NVR510 Rev.15.01.18 and earlier, NVR700W Rev.15.00.19 and earlier, and RTX1210 Rev.14.01.38 and earlier allows a remote authenticated attacker to alter the settings of the product via a specially crafted web page.

item.title: CVE-2021-20844|2024-08-03T17:53:22.863Z -- yamaha%20corporation -- rtx830%2C%20nvr510%2C%20nvr700w%2C%20rtx1210
item.description: Improper neutralization of HTTP request headers for scripting syntax vulnerability in the Web GUI of RTX830 Rev.15.02.17 and earlier, NVR510 Rev.15.01.18 and earlier, NVR700W Rev.15.00.19 and earlier, and RTX1210 Rev.14.01.38 and earlier allows a remote authenticated attacker to obtain sensitive information via a specially crafted web page.
